title: Circular flipview control with position indicators
body: A flipview like behavior that has position indicator on the bottom and changing items is infinite and circular. Swiping from the last item woudl change to the first item and the position idicator will chane to the first as well. Just like a carousel that is found on different web UIs.

comments.body: Take a look at this proposal for a CarouselView control on the WinUI repo. https://github.com/microsoft/microsoft-ui-xaml/issues/771
